snippet.title: How to Play AI Arena: Training Configuration
snippet.description:
#aiarena #indiegame #artificialintelligence #ai #platformfighter 

Timestamps:

00:00 Intro
00:22 How to tell your AI how much of it's training to remember: Training Intensity.
02:47 How to tell your AI what to focus on during training: Focus Area. 
03:39 How to remove idling data from training with Remove Sparsity: Data Cleaning. 
04:07 Balancing your Data Set with Oversampling and Multi Stream: Data Cleaning
06:01 Guppy's demonstration of a Training Configuration Combo
06:39 Analyzing your AI's policy based on your Training Configuration.


Socials : 

Twitter - https://twitter.com/aiarena_
Documentation Site - https://docs.aiarena.io
AI Arena Mint Pass - https://opensea.io/collection/ai-arena-mint-pass
